Getting Started¶

Want to run the app on your machine? To get a local copy up and running follow these simple example steps.

Prerequisites¶

You’ll need the following things to get started: * python 3.7 * virtualenv * virtualenvwrapper * clustalo

pip install virtualenv virtualenvwrapper

Grab your Clustal Omega binary (clustal) here

Installation¶

  1. Set up your environment with virtualenvwrapper

mkvirtualenv alignmentenv
workon alignmentenv

  1. Clone the repo

git clone https://github.com/kennyworkman/alignment-app
cd alignment-app

  1. Install Python dependencies

pip install -r requirements.txt

  1. Initialize SQLite Databse

flask init-db

  1. Run the app locally! (Go to localhost:5000 in your browser to see it)

flask run

Alignment
